member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO
member.summary: The SIP_DISPATCH_INFO structure contains a set of function pointers assigned by the function that your application uses to perform subject interface package (SIP) operations.

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.hSIP
member.summary: This member is reserved and must be set to NULL.

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.pfGet
member.summary: A pointer to the function that retrieves the signed data for the subject. The signature for this function pointer is described in .

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.pfPut
member.summary: A pointer to the function that stores the signed data for the subject. The signature for this function pointer is described in .

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.pfCreate
member.summary: A pointer to the function that returns a structure that contains the subject data. This structure contains the hash of the target. The signature for this function pointer is described in .

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.pfVerify
member.summary: A pointer to the function that verifies the structure that contains the subject data. This structure contains the hash of the target. The signature for this function pointer is described in .

member.name: SIP_DISPATCH_INFO.pfRemove
member.summary: A pointer to the function that removes the signed data for the subject. The signature for this function pointer is described in .
